item.title: VOLVO FH16 REI GAMER v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 15, 2025

VOLVO FH16 REI GAMER v1.0 ETS2

The name “Volvo FH16 Rei Gamer” refers to a popular and highly customized mod for the game Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), rather than an official, real-world truck model. “Rei Gamer” is Portuguese for “King Gamer,” and it’s a name given to the mod because of its high level of detail and extensive customization options.
This particular mod is a favorite among players, especially in the Brazilian ETS2 community, because it elevates the standard Volvo FH16 truck in the game to a new level.

Key Features of the Mod
Customization : The “Rei Gamer” mod is all about customization. It adds a huge variety of parts and accessories that aren’t available on the stock in-game truck. This includes custom bumpers, side skirts, exhaust stacks, light bars, mudflaps, and even unique interiors.
Aesthetics: The mod often features a very specific visual style, which is characteristic of highly personalized trucks in Brazil. This can include flashy chrome parts, intricate paint jobs, and a lower-than-usual ride height.
Sound : A key part of the experience is the custom engine and exhaust sounds that often come with the mod. These sounds are designed to be more realistic and powerful than the default game audio, making the truck feel more immersive.
Performance : The mod usually includes various engine options, with the most powerful being the 750 horsepower engine. This is a real-world engine for the Volvo FH16, but the mod might tweak its performance to feel even more responsive and powerful in the game.
In short, “Volvo FH16 Rei Gamer” isn’t something you can buy in a dealership, but it’s a well-known and beloved digital creation that allows ETS2 players to drive a highly-tuned and visually striking version of the Volvo FH16.

Credits: rei do gamer

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: DIPLOMATA 380 SCANIA v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 15, 2025

DIPLOMATA 380 SCANIA v1.0 ETS2

The Nielson Diplomata 380, a classic high-deck bus from the 1980s, was a significant model for the Brazilian bus manufacturer. It was designed to compete with other large, comfortable coaches of the era. The name “Diplomata 380” refers to its maximum height of 3.80 meters.

While the Diplomata 380 was built on a variety of chassis from different manufacturers, the Scania chassis was a popular and important option. Scania was known for its powerful and reliable engines, which made the bus suitable for long-distance travel.

Key Characteristics of the Diplomata 380 Scania
Chassis: The Diplomata 380 was built on Scania’s BR-116 and later the K 112 chassis, which were known for their air suspension systems. This provided a very smooth and comfortable ride for passengers.
Engine: The early Scania chassis for this bus came with the DS11 Turbo engine, which produced around 305 horsepower. Later models, with the addition of an intercooler, saw an increase in power to 333 horsepower. The powerful engine was essential for the long and winding roads of Brazil.
Production: The Diplomata 380 was in production from the mid-1980s until Nielson (which would later become Busscar) changed its name in 1989.
Design: The bus featured a high floor, or “high-deck” design, which allowed for a large luggage compartment underneath the passenger cabin. The design was a direct response to the market demand for more luggage space and passenger comfort on long-haul routes.

The combination of the iconic Nielson bodywork and the robust Scania chassis made the Diplomata 380 a legendary bus in Brazil’s history of passenger transport.

Credits: the gold game

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
